Row.Text: {@2_MinorCivName}{@2: plural 1?이; 2?가;} 최근 괴롭힘을 당했습니다. 그들의 시민들은 {1_TargetName:textkey}에 보복하길 원합니다. 당신 문명이 그들을 도와 {1_TargetName:textkey}{1: plural 1?과; 2?와;} 전쟁을 일으킨다면 큰 보상이 주어질 것입니다.
{@1_MinorCivName}의 시민들이 그들을 대신하여 전쟁에 나갔다는 사실을 기뻐하고 있습니다.
그들은 당신의 문명이 {1_TargetName:textkey}에 전쟁을 선포하길 원합니다.
{@2_CivName}의 역사가들은 세계의 문명들이 퇴폐적이고 지나친 확장만을 추구하고 있다고 한탄합니다. 그들은 {@1_NationalWonderName}{@1: plural 1?을; 2?를;} 건설하는 문명이 그들의 위엄을 되찾을 것이며 그와 함께 도시 국가의 호의도 되찾을 것이라고 말하고 있습니다.
{2_CivName:textkey}의 상인들은 {1_TargetName:textkey}{1: plural 1?으로; 2?로;} 알려진 먼 도시에 대해 들어본 적이 있습니다. {2_CivName:textkey}{2: plural 1?은; 2?는;} 현재 이 도시를 발견하는 데 도움을 줄 탐험가를 찾고 있으며 해당 도시를 발견하면 보상을 받을 수 있습니다.

{3_MinorCivName:textkey}{3: plural 1?이; 2?가;} 외교에 대한 포럼을 개최하고 있으며 모든 문명의 대표단이 참석하길 권장하고 있습니다. 이 기간 동안 이들에 대한 외교 임무의 효율이 [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_BoostPercentage}%[ENDCOLOR] 더 증가하고 더 많은 [ICON_IFFUENCY]영향력을 제공할 것입니다. ([COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_TurnsRemaining}턴 남음[ENDCOLOR])
{1_MinorCivName:textkey}의 정상회담이 종료되었습니다. 외교 임무의 [ICON_INFLUENCE]영향력이 평소로 돌아갑니다.

{3_MinorCivName:textkey}의 시민들이 곧 국제 축제를 개최할 예정입니다. 축제의 준비를 위해 그들은 알려진 세계의 모든 주요 문명에 사절단을 보냈습니다. {2_TurnsDuration}턴 후 [ICON_TOURISM]관광 산출량이 가장 높은 문명이 사절단에 가장 깊은 인상을 남길 것입니다. 축제가 열리기 전까지 ([COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_TurnsRemaining}턴 남음[ENDCOLOR])
{1_MinorCivName:textkey}{1: plural 1?이; 2?가;} 당신 문명의 [ICON_TOURISM]관광에 깊은 인상을 받았습니다! 그들은 이제 다른 문명에는 전혀 감흥이 없습니다. 성공한 문명(동점 허용):[NEWLINE]
다른 문명이 {1_MinorCivName:textkey}에 깊은 인상을 남겼습니다. 당신의 [ICON_TOURISM]관광 산출량이 충분하지 않았습니다. 성공한 문명(동점 허용):[NEWLINE]
그들은 턴당 [ICON_TOURISM]관광이 가장 많은 문명에게 보상하겠다고 합니다.
{TXT_KEY_CITY_STATE_QUEST_INFLUENCE_TOURISM_FORMAL} 현재 1위 문명의 턴당 [ICON_TOURISM]관광 점수는 {1_LeaderScore}이며 당신의 문명의 턴당 [ICON_TOURISM]관광 점수는 [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_PlayerScore}[ENDCOLOR]입니다.
Explore a site near this city-state.

A brilliant professor from {1_MinorCivName:textkey} has issued a global request for someone to search for valuable artifacts at a nearby location. The first player to send an archaeologist to study this site will be rewarded.
The professor from {1_MinorCivName:textkey} is excited about the results of your excavation, and asserts that whatever you found most definitely belongs in a museum.
Send an archaeologist to a site near this city-state.

A foreign team of archaeologists was one step ahead of you, and excavated the site near {1_MinorCivName:textkey} first. The professor from {1_MinorCivName:textkey} was impressed by their work, and their influence with the city-state has increased.
The City-State of {1_CivName:textkey} wants you to send an archaeologist to study this tile.

The sailors of {1_MinorCivName:textkey} have heard navigators from other civilizations and city-states claim that the earth might be round, and they want you to seek the truth. If you can prove the world is round, your [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with this city-state will increase.
The sailors of {1_MinorCivName:textkey} are in awe of your adept navigators, and are thrilled to learn that the world is neither flat nor a disc.
Be the first to circumnavigate the world.
Someone else has circumnavigated the world for {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Your navigators are disheartened, and your influence with this city-state does not increase.

Partisans from the conquered city of {1_MinorCivName:textkey} have allied with the leaders of {2_MinorCivName:textkey}, and request your help in retaking their capital. If you help the partisans from {1_MinorCivName:textkey} liberate their capital, your [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with both city-states will increase greatly.
The leaders of {2_MinorCivName:textkey} praise your heroic deeds, and thank you for liberating {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
They want you to liberate the City-State of {1_CityStateName:textkey}.
The partisans of {1_CityStateName:textkey} no longer desire your help. As a result, the leaders of {2_MinorCivName:textkey} have revoked their request for assistance.
Assistance with the liberation of {1_MinorCivName:textkey} no longer needed

A horde of barbarians has emerged near {2_MinorCivName:textkey}! If the barbarians maintain their siege at the end of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_TurnsRemaining}[ENDCOLOR] turns, [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]the city will be sacked[ENDCOLOR]!
The barbarian horde near {1_MinorCivName:textkey} failed to sack the city, and has now dispersed.
Protect them from a barbarian horde!
{1_CityStateName:textkey} has fallen to barbarians and [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]has now been sacked[ENDCOLOR]! It will remain under barbarian control until reconquered.

Citizens of {3_MinorCivName:textkey} have started a revolution against {2_TargetName:textkey}! If the rebels maintain a presence for [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_TurnsRemaining}[ENDCOLOR] turns, [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]the city will fall to the revolution[ENDCOLOR] and its alliances will shift.

Citizens of {3_MinorCivName:textkey} have started a revolution against {2_TargetName:textkey}! If the rebels maintain a presence for [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_TurnsRemaining}[ENDCOLOR] turns, [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]the city will fall to the revolution[ENDCOLOR] and its alliances will shift.

Citizens of {2_MinorCivName:textkey} have started a revolution against their current rulers! If the rebels maintain a presence for [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_TurnsRemaining}[ENDCOLOR] turns, [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]the city will fall to the revolution[ENDCOLOR] and its alliances will shift.

Freedom fighters from {3_MinorCivName:textkey} are leading a revolution against {2_TargetName:textkey}! If the rebels maintain a presence for [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_TurnsRemaining}[ENDCOLOR] turns, [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]the city will fall to the revolution[ENDCOLOR] and its alliances will shift.

The proletariat of {3_MinorCivName:textkey} is leading a revolution against {2_TargetName:textkey}! If the rebels maintain a presence for [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_TurnsRemaining}[ENDCOLOR] turns, [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]the city will fall to the revolution[ENDCOLOR] and its alliances will shift.

Guerilla warriors of {3_MinorCivName:textkey} are leading a revolution against {2_TargetName:textkey}! If the rebels maintain a presence for [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_TurnsRemaining}[ENDCOLOR] turns, [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]the city will fall to the revolution[ENDCOLOR] and its alliances will shift.
The revolutionaries of {1_MinorCivName:textkey} failed, and their morale is now broken.
A revolution against their ally is occurring!

The revolution in {2_CityStateName:textkey} was successful, and their alliance with {1_TargetName:textkey} has ended. {2_CityStateName:textkey} now looks to other empires for friendship and protection.
The revolution in {1_CityStateName:textkey} has ended. {1_CityStateName:textkey} now looks to other empires for friendship and protection.
